text: Peter Beckers (3 October 1947 – 6 June 1996) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a Winger. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Footballers from Dundee Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Craigmore Thistle F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Skegness Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Peter Beckers
